official-title.#text:
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to end the increased Federal funding for Medicaid
			 expansion with respect to inmates’ hospital care under the Patient
			 Protection and Affordable Care Act, to apply the savings towards a 2015
			 Medicare Advantage stabilization program to help protect seniors’ choices,
			 and for other purposes.

Such term does not include an individual described in such subparagraph during the period in which

text.#text:
For purposes of this subsection, an eligible Medicare Advantage plan is a Medicare Advantage plan
			 to be offered for plan year 2015 that the

The total costs (including premiums, cost-sharing responsibilities, and deductibles) projected to
			 be applicable to individuals who enroll in such plan for such plan year
			 are at least 7 percent more than the such total costs that were applicable
			 to individuals enrolled in such plan for plan year 2014.

The supplemental benefits to be offered under such plan for such plan year 2015 are less than the
			 supplemental benefits offered under such plan for plan year 2014.

The number of physicians in the plan’s network has been reduced by 3 percent or more from plan year
			 2014 to plan year 2015.
